programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - Highlands Ep7
programme.desc: Cape Breton Highlands National Park was established to protect the primeval forest from clear-cutting – but today the park faces a new threat. Moose, beavers and moths have combined to decimate large sections of the Boreal and Acadian woodlands

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - Wetlands Ep8
programme.desc: Wild Wild East’s wetland habitats are at risk. These marshes and bogs are the ancient home of the endangered Blanding’s Turtle. But each fall new turtles spring from the lake shores of Nova Scotia. If the vulnerable Blanding’s can make it through their first few years of life, they'll live for almost a century. But saving the turtle means protecting the wetlands, and all the other amphibians and reptiles that call the slow-moving waters home.

programme.title: Animal Empires 1 - Family Ep1
programme.desc: Every empire needs a succession plan. Making babies – and raising them – is crucial for every species to survive. In some social circles, it takes a village to raise a family. In others, a single parent is all that stands between the vulnerability of youth and the threats of the wild.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 2 - Kruger's Pafuri Ep2
programme.desc: In the northern reaches of the Kruger National Park, life depends on one thing – water. In a land burdened by heat and drought a single ribbon cuts its reliable course through the wilderness. It’s a lifeline to all creatures, great and small.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - City of Riches Ep1
programme.desc: Stake out the Bay Family’s lush territory, where matriarch Anna offers lavish feasts but faces internal dissent. Size up her rival Mia, the streetwise Townies leader who’s eyeing a lifestyle upgrade, and check in with the isolated Mangrove Family.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - July-August - a Time of Migration Ep4
programme.desc: Witness some of the planet’s most dramatic natural shifts in July, from the Arctic ice sheets that come crashing down during the summer melt to the feeding frenzy when sockeye salmon reach the end of their journey in Alaska.

programme.title: Australia's Hidden Islands 1 - Lady Elliot Island Ep1
programme.desc: Lady Elliot Island is the crown jewel of the Great Barrier Reef- the largest living structure on Earth. This southern-most island of the Reef chain is home to dizzying swirls of colour, life and diversity both above and below the water.

programme.title: Australia's Hidden Islands 1 - Kangaroo Island Ep2
programme.desc: Kangaroo Island, off the southern coast of Australia, is an ocean fortress cut off by wild seas and battered by brutal Southern Ocean winds. It’s an enchanted refuge where some of the most iconic mainland fauna have made a last stand.

programme.title: TechStorm Originals
programme.desc: TechStorm Originals explores the latest upcoming gadgets, app reviews, interviews with tech startups and the hottest news from the tech and Esports scenes.

programme.title: The Gadget Show (S32) Ep11
programme.desc: Jon’s building his own drive in movie theatre to test the latest micro projectors. Following her review of the Xbox Series X, Jordan got her mits on Sony’s PS5. But is it better than the Xbox?

programme.title: Esports Championships East Asia 2021 - Dungeon & Fighter Ep1
programme.desc: The matches and events were held without spectators at the Seoul Olympic Park. While the Chinese team fought strongly, the Korean team changed its tactics. Which team would get the final victory?

programme.title: Making The Squad: Fifa Edition Ep2
programme.desc: The competition intensifies when the contestants overcome football inspired obstacles that test them to their physical limits. After a tense battle in the Dome, contestants get a reality check as two of them pack their controllers and go home.

programme.title: Minecraft Ep3
programme.desc: Take your chance to learn more about Minecraft. Tune in for non-stop fun and countless tips on how to improve your gaming skills!

programme.title: Minecraft Ep4
programme.desc: Take your chance to learn more about Minecraft. Tune in for non-stop fun and countless tips on how to improve your gaming skills!

programme.title: Meet The Drapers (S5) Ep1

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep5
programme.desc: Ants Ants Revolution / Clamsquatch - A group of fire ants swarm the city and it's up to Burn to race their leader in order to get them to leave. However, a worried Chet gets in the way. // The crew travels to Mississippi for a race in the swamp. When Skidmark goes missing, they fear he has been taken by a creepy mythological creature.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep5
programme.desc: Pit - D-Structs traps the Dinotrux in a deep sinkhole pit – but he overlooks tiny Revvit, who comes up with a plan to help his much-bigger friends.

programme.title: Where'S Wally? S2 Ep21
programme.desc: It'S On Like Amazon! - Wally and Wenda go on a mission to return the borrowed Quick Bloom Key to its owner, an Amazon-dwelling wizard named Vinebeard. But Odlulu intercepts the key so she can use its magic for her lemonade stand. Using local trails, Wally and Wenda must track Odlulu through the jungle. They'll have to raft the Amazon and brave Odlulu's ""living"" plants to complete their mission

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever S2 Ep31
programme.desc: A Stu Is Born / Ruffspringa - Richie assembles a team to turn Stu into a social media celebrity. Richie's sheltered dog, Dollar, is adorable -- but he doesn't get out much.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Lucky And The Appaloosa Adventure - Lucky Spirit and Turo team up to help save an abused horse

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep5
programme.desc: The Missing Piece / The Scotchman - Archibald goes on a scavenger hunt for a missing puzzle piece. Archibald marches to a creepy house to deliver a package.

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Heavy Metal - The Rescue Riders get stuck in a cave with their rival, Magnus, during a race to find a new source of an important mineral.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep31
programme.desc: Hard To Gettings / Tummy Fish - After Oh goes on a date with Sharzod, she wants to be in a serious relationship; When the parasites who live in Oh's tummy emerge, Tip is surprised to discover that she is a celebrity to them.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep5
programme.desc: A Fistful Of Herbs - When Po discovers he was poisoned, he sets off to a caravan oasis in the hopes of finding out who the perpetrator is, unknowingly followed by the kid

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep8
programme.desc: Do-Over - Frustrated with life in the future, Cleo attempts to use Brian’s untested time machine to return to ancient Egypt. In the process, she ends up caught in an ever-shrinking time loop which may lead to the destruction of the entire universe.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep31
programme.desc: Snow Day / Guy Misses Out - It only snows one day a year in Troll Village, and Poppy, Branch, and Smidge want to make the most of it. Poppy tries to finally get in a hit in her annual snowball fight with Peppy; Branch is determined to make up for the snow days he missed while in his bunker; Smidge tries to get first place in all of the Snow Day competitions./While waiting for the perfect time to make his big entrance at a party, Guy misses the formation of an inside joke. The Snack Pack tells him “he just had to be there,” but Guy sets out to understand the joke and get in on the laughter.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep31
programme.desc: Love Gauntlet - King Julien tries to get rid of his parents, but when evil Karl traps them in the Love Gauntlet they must prove their family's strength to survive.

programme.title: Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants - Space Ep47
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Aggravated Assault Of The Alien Armada - Oh, the indignity: George and Harold are forced to perform spa treatments on gigantic Biglyans. Also, Dr. Fitzgibbons reveals a shocking secret.

programme.title: Boss Baby Back In Business S2 Ep43
programme.desc: Ocb - Boss' reign as CEO is threatened by a charming, multiple-dimpled Outside Consultant Baby (OCB) hired by the Board of Directors. Boss, furious that OCB will ruin Baby Corp with his poorly thought out ideas, tries to distract him while Staci adds the finishing touches to a project that will make OCB unnecessary, The 24 Hour Diaper.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep5
programme.desc: Adventure - Puss misses the old days adventuring with his buddy Jack Sprat. Fearful he will leave San Lorenzo, Dulcinea concocts a super special adventure surprise with the orphans. But Jack Sprat shows up with the promise of a damsel in distress… who turns out to be a super scary monster.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep5
programme.desc: New Sponsor/ Cleopatra - Sherman goes gaga when his favorite snack in the world, Guapo Taco Pudding, sponsors the show; beautiful Cleopatra turns out to be a belching queen.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep4
programme.desc: African Queen / Mega Snails - The FAST crew is tricked into going to Africa by the Queen of the Banana Slugs for a dangerous journey through the plains in order to save her tribe. // White Shadow is challenged by three over-zealous and over-sized championship sumo wrestler snails to an outrageous wrestling match.

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep5
programme.desc: Big Man On Berk - Thinking he's allergic to Meatlug, Fishlegs gets hypnotized – and wakes up transformed into an invincible warrior known as Thor Bonecrusher.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep5
programme.desc: A Fistful Of Herbs - When Po discovers he was poisoned, he sets off to a caravan oasis in the hopes of finding out who the perpetrator is, unknowingly followed by the kid

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep8
programme.desc: Do-Over - Frustrated with life in the future, Cleo attempts to use Brian’s untested time machine to return to ancient Egypt. In the process, she ends up caught in an ever-shrinking time loop which may lead to the destruction of the entire universe.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep31
programme.desc: Snow Day / Guy Misses Out - It only snows one day a year in Troll Village, and Poppy, Branch, and Smidge want to make the most of it. Poppy tries to finally get in a hit in her annual snowball fight with Peppy; Branch is determined to make up for the snow days he missed while in his bunker; Smidge tries to get first place in all of the Snow Day competitions./While waiting for the perfect time to make his big entrance at a party, Guy misses the formation of an inside joke. The Snack Pack tells him “he just had to be there,” but Guy sets out to understand the joke and get in on the laughter.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep31
programme.desc: Love Gauntlet - King Julien tries to get rid of his parents, but when evil Karl traps them in the Love Gauntlet they must prove their family's strength to survive.

programme.title: Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants - Space Ep47
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Aggravated Assault Of The Alien Armada - Oh, the indignity: George and Harold are forced to perform spa treatments on gigantic Biglyans. Also, Dr. Fitzgibbons reveals a shocking secret.

programme.title: Boss Baby Back In Business S2 Ep43
programme.desc: Ocb - Boss' reign as CEO is threatened by a charming, multiple-dimpled Outside Consultant Baby (OCB) hired by the Board of Directors. Boss, furious that OCB will ruin Baby Corp with his poorly thought out ideas, tries to distract him while Staci adds the finishing touches to a project that will make OCB unnecessary, The 24 Hour Diaper.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep5
programme.desc: Adventure - Puss misses the old days adventuring with his buddy Jack Sprat. Fearful he will leave San Lorenzo, Dulcinea concocts a super special adventure surprise with the orphans. But Jack Sprat shows up with the promise of a damsel in distress… who turns out to be a super scary monster.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep5
programme.desc: New Sponsor/ Cleopatra - Sherman goes gaga when his favorite snack in the world, Guapo Taco Pudding, sponsors the show; beautiful Cleopatra turns out to be a belching queen.

programme.desc: Big Man On Berk - Thinking he's allergic to Meatlug, Fishlegs gets hypnotized – and wakes up transformed into an invincible warrior known as Thor Bonecrusher.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep5
programme.desc: A Fistful Of Herbs - When Po discovers he was poisoned, he sets off to a caravan oasis in the hopes of finding out who the perpetrator is, unknowingly followed by the kid

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep8
programme.desc: Do-Over - Frustrated with life in the future, Cleo attempts to use Brian’s untested time machine to return to ancient Egypt. In the process, she ends up caught in an ever-shrinking time loop which may lead to the destruction of the entire universe.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep31
programme.desc: Love Gauntlet - King Julien tries to get rid of his parents, but when evil Karl traps them in the Love Gauntlet they must prove their family's strength to survive.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep33
programme.desc: Rupert And The Grumbleclouds - Rupert goes to meet Bill who seems very grumpy. Bill has grumble clouds over his head. Edward is the next one to have a dark, purple cloud over his head and he becomes very sad. Ping Pong tries a spell and the clouds break up and go away but then they return above everyone's head. Everyone gets the grumps except Rupert and Ming. Rupert and Ming try to make the others laugh and succeed with their disastrous magic show. Everyone starts laughing and they all cheer up!

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep34
programme.desc: Rupert And The Playful Wind - Rupert, Ping Pong, Ming, Edward and Bill meet a young wind, Gustus. All of the grown up winds are too busy making weather and Gustus has no one to play with so he gets very bored and mischievous and causes chaos with his wind. Rupert shows Gustus some games he can play using his wind in a more productive way.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep33
programme.desc: Raa Raa Gets Hiccups - Raa Raa can't get rid of his hiccups. Can his friends help him?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep34
programme.desc: Ooo Ooo'S Wriggly Jiggly Game - Topsy is having a party and Raa Raa is helping organise the games. But not everybody is good at them. Can Raa Raa and his friends come up with new games that all the friends are good at and enjoy?

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep7
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Zooming Zipwire - Ted and PC Selby are building a zipwire to run from Greendale Crag all the way down into the valley. The kids are on a hike, led by Lauren which is due to culminate at the zipwire – the only trouble is, it's not built yet! Pat and Jess have to race against time to deliver the huge steel cable to the top of the crag before the kids get there. All's going well until Pat hits bumpy ground and the cable rolls out of the back of the jeep and back down the hill! It takes the combined efforts of Pat, Ben, the SDS helicopter and some nifty map reading to rewind the uncoiled and hopelessly tangled cable and get it back up to Greendale Crag. Pat makes it just in time and the zipwire is a roaring success – even Pat and Jess have a go on it. Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep8
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Super Jet Boots - Julian and the kids at Greendale School are excited about a Festival of flight - Ted's coming to talk about aviation and Alf's bringing Cedric the racing pigeon. Pat has to deliver special jet boots to the school, built by Ted's inventor friend. Ted will demonstrate them. But on the way to Greendale, Pat stops to help Alf, whose cows have got loose. Pat sees Ajay, out for a day's bird-watching. Pat has promised to lend Ajay his wellies and asks Ajay to get them from the van, but Ajay takes the jet boots by mistake. By the time Pat realises the mixup, Ajay is airborne and can't control the powerful boots... Meanwhile Alf and Ted grow competitive as they try to win the kids' attention. Attempts to shout instructions to Ajay fail, but Pat realises Cedric could be the solution. The brave bird takes an instruction leaflet up to Ajay - who is then able to control the boots (using his toes) with ease! Meera, Julian and the others are delighted as Ajay touches down at Greendale School with the help of Cedric - the most welcome bird Ajay has ever watched!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep85
programme.desc: Aunt Tulip'S Carnival - All the tots are excited as Aunt Tulip is holding a Caribbean themed carnival. But will the weather hold long enough for them to have their celebrations?

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep86
programme.desc: Storm - It is a windy day in the garden, Fifi's washing has blown away. Poppy offers to find it, but she gets caught in the storm. The other tots set out to find her and spend a wild night out in the open.

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep33
programme.desc: Ralf’S Last Prank - Ralf’s Last Prank When Dennis and the gang think they've caused Ralf to 'get the sack', they're determined to make his last day at Bash Street School epic by setting up the greatest mega-prank Ralf's ever known.

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep34
programme.desc: Extreme Sports Day - Dennis recruits Grizzly Griller to help make sports day more extreme, but as he and JJ get competitive against each other, who is sabotaging both their chances of winning?

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep43
programme.desc: Kral Zera - While the team struggles to come to an agreement, Haggar’s motives to take the throne escalate to epic proportions

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep17
programme.desc: Almost Famoose: Chapter Four - Rocky and Bullwinkle return to Frostbite Falls to discover that because they failed to rebuild the giant birdbath, their beloved town is now completely overrun with dirty, zombie-like birds.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep17
programme.desc: The Terror Of Tickula / Prank’D - Turbo and Whiplash meet a strange tick who may be out to harm Turbo.//When the crew starts a prank war, Chet is nervous that he is the next target.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep6
programme.desc: Garby - Just as Ty Rux welcomes Garby, a loud and smelly Stegarbasaurus, to the crater, Revvit disappears and the gang embarks on a dangerous rescue mission.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Mountain Mayhem / Gator Spinner Max - After winning a citizen swap contest, Archibald moves to a mountain town for a week. Archibald finds a practical use for his pal's wacky invention.

programme.title: Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants - Space Ep42
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Senseless Torment Of The Space Toilet - Inspired by their favorite TV show, George and Harold — along with Principal Krupp — blast off to outer space, where an angry toilet awaits.

programme.title: Boss Baby Back In Business S2 Ep44
programme.desc: Chicago - Boss and family go on Spring Break to visit his grandparents in the big city of Chicago. Boss uses the trip to test his business mettle, by getting in a promotion war at a real big adult company. And when a department store refuses to let Gigi and Tim return an item, they wind up unionizing the entire sales force.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep6
programme.desc: Poison In The Pit Of The Plum - When Po and the kids stop for the night at an Inn, they meet a gang who wants to fight Po and end up down a path to uncovering Jindiao's evil plan

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep32
programme.desc: Scrap To The Future / Bringing Up Birdy - As she’s preparing for the Hearts & Crafts Festival, Poppy finds a mysterious scrapbook that seems to predict the future – and it shows the festival being a disaster! She and Branch set out to prevent the predictions from coming true. But is there a downside to being over prepared?/When a nest full of just-hatched baby birds imprint on Branch, he must overcome his fear of birds in order to raise them right.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep6
programme.desc: Caved And Confused - When Grug and Ugga leave the kids alone on date night, Eep throws the first-ever house party that rages out of control and almost destroys the cave.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep31
programme.desc: Hard To Gettings / Tummy Fish - After Oh goes on a date with Sharzod, she wants to be in a serious relationship; When the parasites who live in Oh's tummy emerge, Tip is surprised to discover that she is a celebrity to them.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Lucky And The Not-So-Secret Surprise - Lucky enlists Abigail Turo Snips and their horses to help plan a surprise birthday party for Pru that goes disastrously wrong

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Iced Out - Frustrated that she's not fitting in with the team, Aggro goes off on her own with Elbone on a mission to save a dragon egg trapped in ice.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep37
programme.desc: Why Bees Sting - You see there was a time when Bees didn't sting. All the animals loved the Bees and they especially loved their sweet and yummy honey. The trouble was all the precious honey was disappearing and there was a honey crisis in Tinga Tinga. Something had to be done. Luckily clever old Tortoise has a cunning plan. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep38
programme.desc: Why Peacock Struts - You see there was a time when Peacock didn't strut. He was a very proud bird and he wanted to be the best at everything. He wanted to be the best bird-brain in Tinga Tinga. He wanted to be the best flyer in Tinga Tinga and he wanted to have the biggest and the best tail in Tinga Tinga…. But as Lion so wisely points out ‘Sometimes it's not good to get everything you want!' Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep37
programme.desc: The Case Of The Empty Swapsie Wagon - Cloppycorn is in charge of the Swapsy Game. Everyone puts a toy into the Swapsy Wagon and takes a toy out! It's brilliant fun – until the fairies yo yo. disappears from the wagon altogether. Cloppycorn's very upset. No one will trust him to pull the wagon again! Noddy tells him not to worry. He's going to investigate and help Cloppycorn find the missing toys. With the help of Bumpy and Revs, Noddy uses his investigative skills to work out that the two fairies had taken out the yo yo themselves because they were worried Cloppycorn wouldn't look after it. They apologies to Cloppycorn and the swapsy game starts again. And this time, everyone plays together! Well done Noddy. Case closed!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep38
programme.desc: The Case Of The Unhappy Unicorn - Cloppycorn is very upset unhappy because his special felt ball, Snuggleball, is missing. Noddy needs to investigate quickly! He follows the clues around Fable Forest and discovers that PatPat broke snuggleball by mistake when she rode over it with her scooter. Noddy asks PatPat to make a new snuggleball but Cloppycorn doesn't like it. It doesn't feel cuddly like his special toy. Clever Noddy asks everyone in Toyland to give the new snuggleball a big hug. When he takes the new snuggleball back to Cloppycorn it feels just as huggly and snuggly as the old ball. What a good idea, Noddy! Well done!

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep37
programme.desc: How Can We Hide To Watch Butterflies? - JESS, JOEY and JINX go to the Whispering Woods in the hope of seeing some butterflies, but the puppies are so lively and noisy that they frighten them away. JESS wonders “how can we hide to watch butterflies?” That's the Big Question! JESS decides to make somewhere to hide out of natural materials. The puppies and Jess try to build a hide out of stones but they're too heavy and all fall down. Jess thinks that something lighter might work well but when they try to build a hide out of straw it's TOO light and flies away in the wind. JESS is stuck - there must be some other material on Greendale Farm they could use. But all that's around them are trees. Jess works out that trees are made out of wood and there are lots of old wooden apple crates in Willow's Stable which will do the job perfectly. JESS, JOEY and JINX build a butterfly hide out of wooden apple crates and soon see lots and lots of beautiful butterflies. Yippety yay!

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep38
programme.desc: How Can I Go Faster Than Joey And Jinx? - It's a snowy day on Greendale Farm so Jess and his friends have a race down Cherry Hill. Jess wants to win the race but he can't run as fast in the snow. “How can I go faster than Joey and Jinx?” Thinks Jess. That's the Big Question. First, Jess tries rolling down the hill like the puppies but he's not a good roller so that doesn't work. Horace shows Jess how he slides down his slide in the pond. Jess tries again at Cherry Hill but can't get going. Helped by Billie and Baa he remembers everything that Horace did - pushing off, going ‘Wheeeee! and lifting his legs up - but nothing works; he ends up sitting in the snow and not sliding at all. He needs something that will move on its own like Mimi's trolley! Jess tries sliding down the hill on the trolley but the wheels get stuck in the snow. Jess decides to take the wheels off and see if the trolley moves faster. Jess whizzes down the hill on the trolley top much faster than the rolling puppies. It's brilliant fun and he's answered the question. Yippety Ya

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep6
programme.desc: Turbo Stinks / Snails In Jail - On the day Turbo unveils a new cologne he has created, birds suddenly start attacking the city and it's up to the crew to figure out how to get rid of the feathery menaces before anyone gets eaten/Travelling through the desert to visit a kid snail who is sick, the crew runs afoul of a villainous sheriff who puts them in jail until Turbo agrees to throw a race.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep35
programme.desc: Rupert’S Bird’S Eye View - Rupert and Bill wish they could see more from the Tree House Telescope so Rupert asks Ping Pong to do some magic to give them a better view. Unfortunately the magic is more powerful than they expect and the Telescope Platform, with Rupert and Bill on board, detaches itself and flies off to find a better view. At first, Rupert and Bill are excited to be flying about, but then the Telescope begins to cause trouble, first landing on Ping Pong's Pagoda, then heading to Rocky Bay where it lands on the Lighthouse to enjoy the sea view. By now, Rupert and Bill, who cannot get down, want to go home and the Lighthouse Keeper is beside himself. The Telescope Platform is blocking the Lighthouse light and with night approaching it will be a disaster if they cannot get the Platform to go back to the Tree House.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep36
programme.desc: Rupert And The Memory Man - The friends don't know what to do when a spell goes wrong and Edward loses his memory. Although Raggety summons up the Memory Man to show Edward some exciting memories from his past he still can't remember anything until Rupert gives him one of his very favourite things: an apple…..

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep35
programme.desc: Raa Raa'S Perfect Present - Raa Raa is sure he has found the perfect present for each of his friends… but what happens if the packages get mixed up?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep36
programme.desc: Raa Raa The Copycat - Raa Raa is playing a game - copying everyone in the jungle. He soon distracts his friends… but can he put the game to good use?

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep9
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Spring Lamb - Julian's preparing for “spring has sprung”, the Greendale school play, when pat gets a special delivery call. It's a yeti costume for Bill. When Pat is diverted into the countryside by PC Selby, he spots one of Alf's missing sheep - and she's about to have a lamb! Alf can't get there as his quad bike is being fixed, so Pat offers to take the sheep in his van. But the sheep is reluctant to move. Meanwhile, Bill is worried that his costume won't turn up and he'll let his classmates down. Out in the fields, Pat hits upon the idea of dressing up like a woolly sheep by putting on the yeti costume. It works! But there's another surprise in store as he delivers the sheep to alf at the school - she's had her lamb! Bill, Pat and lamb all play starring roles in the play. Mission Accomplished!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep10
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Painted Sheep - Pat has got to deliver special cans of blue dye for Alf to mark up his cheeky runaway sheep. That way, when they get out, he can work out which sheep belong to him! Meanwhile, the kids are having a special delivery service day of their own as Ben gives them a tour of the Sorting Office. It's not much fun as Ben won't let them touch anything – and when they do, they cause chaos! Meanwhile, Alf's sheep have runaway and Pat can't find either them or Alf! By using the tracking device on Alf's phone and deputising the kids to be act as “special delivery deputies”, Pat is eventually able to locate Alf and the runaway sheep! Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep87
programme.desc: Just One Hornetto - Stingo's cousin Hornetto pays a visit to the garden and quickly charms all the tots. Stingo and Slugsy decide he must be stopped from staying permanently at all costs!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Sleeping Like a Baby - Baby sleeps in his parents' bed and loves it so much, he tries to make it a permanent arrangement.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep908
programme.desc: Pups Save the Hatchlings / Pups Save a Wrongway Farmhand - When Mayor Humdinger decides to make the world's biggest omelet, he accidentally orders the wrong kind of eggs - ones that hatch. // Traveling Travis volunteers to watch Farmer Yumi and Farmer Al's Farm and characteristically messes up everything.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Paddington Makes a Scrapbook / Paddington Digs a Tunnel to Peru - Paddington decides to make a scrapbook of memories and tries to include all his friends to show Aunt Lucy. // Paddington decides to dig a Tunnel through the centre of the earth to Peru but ends up in Mr. Curry's green house.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep304

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Fast Feud / Never Friending Story - Ronnie Anne and Sid try to take down the obnoxious burger restaurant that opened up across the street. // After picking Par as his new best friend, Bobby realizes he may be in over his head.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep220
programme.desc: Strife Coach / Gossip Girl - Ronnie Anne and her friends help get Mrs. Kernicky hired as the new PE coach, but her classes are no joke! // When a Sid secret is leaked at school, Ronnie Anne and Sid wonder if they can continue being best buds!

programme.title: LEGO City Adventures S03 Ep306
programme.desc: Duke Time / Harpy Stubbs - An exhausted Duke Detain takes his first day off after an uncharacteristic mistake on duty. // An unlikely friendship develops between Poppy Starr, the world's biggest pop star, and Harl Hubbs, the city's humble, helpful handyman.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Side Hustle / Burt Speaks - Parker picks up a bunch of side hustles in order to afford the perfect gift for Angus. // Parker believes Burt can speak via popping bubble wrap, and pretty soon, the whole mountain seeks Burt's wisdom.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep404
programme.desc: The Crow That Ate My Homework - Dave promises to take Alvin to a water park if he gets a good grade on his test, but then a crow steals it.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep405
programme.desc: Simon Says - When Alvin accuses Simon of being too safe, Simon agrees to do whatever crazy thing Alvin wants him to do.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep405
programme.desc: Sing Like A Canary - A cute singing bird replaces Alvin in the band after Alvin makes too many demands as a performer.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep406
programme.desc: Pirates Life - When pirates show up at the house, the boys do all they can to protect a treasure chest that arrived for Dave.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S10 Ep209
programme.desc: SpongeBob's Place / Plankton Gets the Boot - When SpongeBob cooks at home, Mr. Krabs' customers leave his restaurant and head for SpongeBob's Place. // When Plankton gets kicked out of the house, it's up to SpongeBob to teach him how to win his computer wife back.

programme.title: Danger Force S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Twin It to Win It - Captain Man makes twin superheroes, ShoutOut and AWOL, compete over who can catch more criminals using their own ways of crime-fighting.

programme.title: Star Trek: Prodigy S01 Ep111
programme.desc: Asylum - At the edge of Federation space, the crew applies for asylum at Deep Space 13, only for their starship to reveal its shocking true purpose.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Away Game / Monster Cash - Abuela worries that Ronnie Anne and Bobby will want to live at their Dad's new apartment instead. // Carl hosts a haunted tour based on Abuela's tale of 'El Cucuy,' and learns that it may not be fiction.

programme.title: The Loud House S06 Ep615
programme.desc: A Stella Performance - Stella wins a school competition and is super excited - until she learns she has to give a public presentation.

programme.title: The Loud House S06 Ep615
programme.desc: A Stella Performance - Stella wins a school competition and is super excited - until she learns she has to give a public presentation.

programme.title: Big Nate S01 Ep101
programme.desc: The Legend of the Gunting - Nate has multiple detentions on the docket, per usual. But this time he is one detention away from a fate only whispered about in the halls of P.S. 38 AND the unhinged new kid is determined to become Nate's prank partner

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S03 Ep59
programme.desc: The Spongebob SquarePants Lost Episodes - SpongeBob is jellyfishing when he wistfully realizes that he wants to fly. // Patchy the Pirate is set to present a never before seen episode of Spongebob with one problem - no tape.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S03 Ep60
programme.desc: Spongebob Meets the Strangler / Pranks Alot - SpongeBob catches someone littering and turns him in - but it's the Tattletale Strangler! // SpongeBob and Patrick invest in some magic "invisible spray" at the local prank shop.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Darker Parker / Lady of the Tree - Parker makes snowcones for everybody in town and learns that saying 'no' isn't always a bad thing. // Parker and Angus make a delivery to a spooky old woman in the Middlemost Forest... who might be a witch!

programme.title: The Loud House S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Linc or Swim / Changing the Baby - Lincoln purchases a kiddie pool, and things get out of hand when all 10 of his sisters want to use it. // After noticing that none of his sisters share his interests, Lincoln attempts to mold Lily into his mini-me.

programme.title: The Loud House S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Hand-Me-Downer / Sleuth or Consequences - After Lincoln gets a pink hand-me-down bike from Lori, he borrows Lynn's cool BMX bike without telling her. // Someone clogged the Loud House toilet and Lincoln sets out to find out whodunit.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Karate Chops / Taco The Town - Used to being top dog, Carl can't handle when Adelaide joins his karate class and becomes the star student. // Hector starts selling Rosa's delicious tacos but gets overwhelmed when they're more popular than the mercado!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Going Overboard / Walk Don't Run - Ronnie Anne begs Tio Carlos to teach her some moves when she finds out he is a famous skateboarder. // In order to buy a new skateboard, Ronnie Anne and Sid start a dog-walking business.

programme.title: It's Pony S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Haircut / Gerry's Birthday - When Annie needs a haircut, Pony proves that even a simple task can become a wild adventure. // When Annie and Pony try to give Gerry the best birthday ever, their enthusiasm threatens to make it the worst.

programme.title: It's Pony S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Pet Pony / Dog Day - When pets are banned from the building, Annie and Pony have to convince the landlord to reconsider. // When the dog from next door, Pony's sworn enemy, comes to stay with them, Annie needs to find a way to make them get along.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep219
programme.desc: Man Ray Returns / Larry the Floor Manager - When Man Ray rents Squidward's house for the weekend, it's up to SpongeBob and Patrick to stop his evil vacation! // Mr. Krabs takes a vacation and makes Larry the Lobster the temporary manager of the Krusty Krab.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep221
programme.desc: No Pictures, Please / Stuck on the Roof - Patrick leads an enthusiastic stranger on a tour of his favorite places in Bikini Bottom. // SpongeBob is afraid to get off the roof of the Krusty Krab, but he won't let that stop him from living his life!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep222
programme.desc: Krabby Patty Creature Feature / Teacher's Pests - A new secret Krabby Patty formula has disastrous results for Bikini Bottom, and only SpongeBob can save the day. // Mr. Krabs and Plankton have to take boating school classes. Thankfully, SpongeBob's there to show them the ropes!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep224
programme.desc: Squid Noir / Scavenger Pants - When his clarinet goes missing, Squidward must become a hardboiled detective to track it down. // Squidward sends SpongeBob and Patrick on an increasingly difficult scavenger hunt to get them out of his hair.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep222
programme.desc: Mama Told Me Not to Kung Fu - Crane's mom visits the Valley of Peace. Crane reveals to Po that his mom hates Kung Fu so he promised her that he would never have anything to do with it. Crane asks Po and the others to help him keep his secret from his mom.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep223
programme.desc: Huge - Self-conscious about his size, Mantis ingests a growth potion that makes him huge. Mantis is initially thrilled with the results, but soon his large size puts the entire village and his friends in grave danger.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S01 Ep101
programme.desc: The Boy in the Iceberg - When a young waterbender, named Katara, and her brother, Sokka, discover a giant iceberg while fishing for food around their homestead at the South Pole, they discover that there is a boy, named Aang, inside.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S02 Ep204
programme.desc: Gator Watch - When Roger's home in the sewer becomes unbearable the Penguins try to find him a new home in the city. Soon citizens of New York city spot Roger all over town.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Launchtime / Haunted Habitat - Sick of Julien's annoying presence, the penguins decide to take a vacation on The Moon. // After Marlene is frightened by a spooky noise in the night, she and Skipper travel down to the sewer below the zoo to find the source of the scary moans.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Operation: Plush & Cover / Happy King Julien Day! - When stuffed Mort dolls become popular at the zoo, Julien gets jealous and get them recalled. // Maurice bribes the zoo animals to celebrate "King Julien Day" by offering them candy.

programme.title: Breadwinners S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Quazy for Vanessa / Tunnel of Fear - SwaySway and Buhdeuce disguise the rocket van as a girl to keep Oonski from stealing it, but their planbackfires when Oonski falls head-over-wheels in love. // The ducks are forced to enter into a scary part of the bread mines.

programme.title: The Barbarian and the Troll S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Mapmaker, Mapmaker, Make Me A Map - In need of a unique custom map for their next quest, Brendar and the group attempt to wine and dine the only map maker in Gothmoria capable of creating the map they need.

programme.title: Dorg Van Dango S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Dorg's in a Pickle / Dorg Gets a Job - When the gang use their powers to get Normill's very last pickle out of an ancient jar, they're left chasing a giant runaway pickle jar through town! // Dorg gets a job rounding up shopping carts at the mall, but Patronella brings the carts to life!

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty S01 Ep113

programme.desc: Home On The Range/Ranch-A-Pal-Ooza - When a dinosaur named Wanda keeps running away from the Ranch, Min, Jon and Miguel discover that she's eager to join to a dinosaur family that wants to welcome her as one of their own.

programme.title: Ranger Rob Ep338/Ep315
programme.desc: Lunchtime Launchtime In Big Sky Park/Bandits In Big Sky Park - Rob and Stomper are excited when Dakota invites them for a picnic lunch in the jungle.

programme.title: Mush Mush And The Mushables Ep112/Ep130
programme.desc: The Missing Mushlet/The Rollinator - So Mushpie can take a break, Mush-Mush, ChEp.and Lilit offer to look after the Mushies, assuring her that everything will be fine.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes Ep8A/Ep61A/Ep113A/Ep18B/Ep71A/Ep123A/Ep28B
programme.desc: Not Lyin' Lion/Love It Or Survivalist It/Yosemite Samson/Aromatherapest/Cyrano de Bugs/Lola Rider/Home A Clone - Bugs and Squeaks head to the African Savannah to visit Squeaks' cousin, but first they have to outsmart the very hungry King of the Jungle, Thes.

programme.title: The Looney Tunes Show Ep16/Ep37
programme.desc: That's My Baby/We're In Big Truffle - Daffy gets roped into babysitting by his girlfriend.

programme.title: Mighty Mike Ep11/Ep21/Ep33/Ep45/Ep57/Ep68/Ep69
programme.desc: A Sick Trick/Itchy Frenzy/That Magnificent Mike!/It's Been A Slice/Sauna/Animal Magnetism/Hypnosis - Freddy crashes into the Mikkelsen's bay window, forcing the family to take him in. Mike sees through the ruse, but he'll have to defeat the imposter without getting himself in trouble.

programme.title: Tom And Jerry Theatricals Ep28/Ep31/Ep88/Ep125/Ep16/Ep8/Ep29/Ep49
programme.desc: Fine Feathered Friend/The Flying Cat/Putting on the Dog/Vanishing Duck/Cruise Cat/Busy Buddies/Fit To Be Tied/Johann Mouse - Jerry enjoys the protection of a mothering hen.

programme.title: Pat The Dog Ep68/Ep69/Ep219/Ep220/Ep233/Ep228/Ep229/Ep230
programme.desc: Piñata Party/Sir Pat the Knight/Guanozilla/The Ferret Sitter/Tiki To The Limit/The Friendship Letter/The Recruit/Where Is My Phone? - Lola finds Victor sad and alone in his garden. Tomorrow is his birthday and nothing has been planned for the special day.

programme.title: Unikitty Ep97/Ep56/Ep15/Ep36/Ep67
programme.desc: Borrowed/Rainbow Race/Hide N' Seek/Dancer Danger/Volcano - Richard discovers his library books have been borrowed by Master Frown, and sets off on a crazed mission to return the books before they're overdue.

programme.title: Chowder Ep8A/Ep29A/Ep18A/Ep48
programme.desc: Gazpacho Stands Up/The B.L.T.'S/The Broken Part/Chowder Grows Up - Chowder gives Gazpacho a hand in preparing for his big comedy debut. But Chowder's poor penmanship threatens to turn the situation from funny to failure.

programme.title: The Powerpuff Girls Ep116/Ep158/Ep201/Ep125/Ep166
programme.desc: Arachno-Romance/Summer Bummer/Small World: Maze Daze - Part 3/Viral Spiral/Spider Sense - The Powerpuff Girls get suspicious of the Professor's new girlfriend and conspire to break them up.

programme.title: Ben 10 Ep116/Ep155/Ep195/Ep217/Ep253
programme.desc: Riding The Storm Out/The Nature Of Things/Beach Heads/And Xingo Was His Name-O/Digital Quality - Ben and Gwen's camping trip is interrupted by the emotionless Weatherheads. But a malfunctioning Omnitrix, firing out a mishmash of aliens, may not be the forecast for success.

programme.title: Foster's Home For Imaginary Friends Ep15/Ep3
programme.desc: A Wilt there's a Way / Everybody Knows/House of Bloo's Part 3 - Wilt wants to watch his favourite basketball team on TV

programme.title: Foster's Home For Imaginary Friends Ep4/Ep16
programme.desc: Busted/Partying is Such Sweet Soiree - Bloo breaks a statue of Madame Foster.

programme.title: Unikitty Ep16/Ep57/Ep85/Ep62/Ep102
programme.desc: No Day Like Snow Day/Beep/Too Cool/Safety First/The Unikingdom Awards - When a blizzard hits the town, Master Frown tries to ruin everyone's fun by pretending to be a magical snowman!

programme.title: Pat The Dog Ep70/Ep71/Ep225/Ep226/Ep239/Ep234/Ep235/Ep236
programme.desc: No Rest for Pat/Bird-Brain Buffet/Guano Scooter/Reducing Your Pawprint/Messy Bedroom/Relax Pat/Soap Box Derby/The Treasure Map - Today Lola is spending the afternoon in the company of her old neighbor, Honorine. They are going to play some games, and taste pies.

programme.title: The Powerpuff Girls Ep69B/Ep56A/Ep28B/Ep15B/Ep4A
programme.desc: Oops I Did It Again/Burglar Alarmed/Child Fearing/Supper Villain/Buttercrush - When the Professor realizes that all his successful experiments are actually just accidents, he sets out to do something brilliant on purpose!

programme.title: New Looney Tunes Ep8B/Ep61B/Ep113B/Ep19A/Ep71B/Ep123B/Ep29A

programme.title: The Looney Tunes Show Ep18/Ep35
programme.desc: Dmv/A Christmas Carol - Daffy is forced to take a test to get his drivers license after hed discovered driving without one.

programme.title: Esme & Roy Ep233/Ep234
programme.desc: Dream Team/It’S A Jungle Out There - When Hugo and Tillie start turning everything into a competition, it’s up to Esme and Roy to find a way for them to play together.

programme.title: Monchhichi Tribe Ep132/Ep133
programme.desc: My Best Friend Aikor/The Night Of The Sparkling Monchhibugs - Irritated by Willow's ingeniousness, Aikor decides to cast a "friend-catching spell" on him!

programme.title: Mush Mush And The Mushables Ep133/Ep105
programme.desc: Compost To Go/Oh My Compost - When Mush-Mush, ChEp.and Lilit take their compost meals back to their home-tree to eat, they think they have made a great new discovery.

programme.title: Ranger Rob Ep316/Ep337
programme.desc: A Warthog In Big Sky Park/Ogety Jokety In Big Sky Park - Rob and Stomper decide to throw a welcome party for a new arrival in the park: A playful warthog named Morty.

programme.title: Brave Bunnies Ep114/Ep136
programme.desc: A Trunkful Of Fun/An Interesting Hunt - It's a super-hot day in the Jungle! Eli the ELEPHANT is trumpeting noisily as he plays the Elephant King game, until he sees the Brave Bunnies and hides!

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings Ep5/Ep16/Ep26/Ep38/Ep50/Ep64/Ep74
programme.desc: Extreme Fitness/Random Bear/Mind in a Whirl/The Sound of a Lemming/Lemmings Indigestion/Augmented Bear/Clean Bear - In order to seduce the she-bear he's infatuated with Grizzy decides to take things in hand and slim down with the ranger's bodybuilding equipment.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo! Mystery Incorporated Ep5/Ep6
programme.desc: The Song Of Mystery/The Legend Of Alice May - A hideous creature named Que Horrifico is turning the children of Crystal Cove into monsters.

programme.title: Tom And Jerry Tales Ep2C/Ep6A/Ep9B/Ep13A/Ep14C/Ep18C/Ep24A
programme.desc: Tomb It May Concern/The Cat Nebula/Cat Got Your Luggage/Tin Cat of Tomorrow/Which Witch/Over the River and Boo the Woods/DJ Jerry - Jerry is a famed Egyptologist who discovers an ancient tomb. Tom is a crafty tomb raider, intent on raiding the riches until he comes face-to-face....

programme.title: Brave Bunnies Ep116/Ep146
programme.desc: Queen Of The Mountain/Rain Race - On a snowy Mountainside, Hans, a yodeling MOUNTAIN GOAT, clambers down to meet the Brave Bunnies.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis Ep37/Ep16

programme.desc: Museum Crime Scenes - Ransoming Stolen Art. Artwork, jewels: Every year, art thieves steal precious objects that are worth millions. But stolen art can rarely be re-sold. That’s why it’s often ransomed, instead. Investigators call this practice "artnapping”.

programme.title: UFC 281: Adesanya vs. Pereira
programme.desc: Prelims - “The Last Stylebender” will take over the Big Apple again on Saturday, November 12, as Israel Adesanyadefends his middleweight title againt Brazilian knockout artist Alex Pereira in the main event of UFC 281 atMadison Square Garden in New York City.Fighting in “The World’s Most Famous Arena” for the first time since a Performance of the Night knockout ofDerek Brunson in 2018, Adesanya will now put his undisputed 185-pound title on the line for the sixth timeagainst Pereira, who is unbeaten in three UFC bouts, including a July finish of Sean Strickland, and owns apair of kickboxing victories over Adesanya. Plus, the championship doubleheader kicks off in the strawweightdivision, as surging two-time champion Carla Esparza defends her crown against China’s Zhang Weili, who islooking to regain the 115-pound title, and lightweight action heroes Dustin Poirier and Michael Chandler squareoff in what promises to be a Fight of the Year candidate
